# Tests issue 49137. The following commands should not panic any way.

! go list '"a"'
stderr '^malformed import path "\\"a\\"": invalid char ''"''$'

! go build '' -ldflags='-X "main.Tags="'
stderr '^malformed import path "-ldflags=-X \\"main.Tags=\\"": leading dash$'

-- go.mod --
module m

go 1.16
-- main.go --
package main
